titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Messrs Essai Johannes, Treasurer, Arathoon Malcolm, Linguist and Catchatoor Johannes, Agent at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter investing authority for the conduct of duties at the Residency at Bushire to Essai Johannes, Arathoon Malcolm, and Catchatoor Johannes as Colonel Stannus is about to embark on his tour of the Arabian Coast. The letter proceeds in outlining the duties he expects the individuals to carry out during his absence; the procedures to be observed when communicating with the Shaikh of Bushire; the financial matters to be attended to; and arrangements to ensure boats are sent to Bassidore [Bāsa‘īdū] every ten days.
